tests.name: balanced_types
tests.description: Animal types should be evenly distributed (counts within 1 of each other)

tests.name: turtle_weight
tests.description: Turtle weight should average around 50.0 kg

tests.description: Cat weight should average around 5.0 kg

tests.name: weight_height_correlation
tests.description: Weight and height should have strong negative correlation

tests.name: winter_births
tests.description: All animals should be born in winter months (Dec, Jan, Feb)

tests.name: cat_swimming
tests.description: Cats should have ~90% swimming ability

tests.name: bird_swimming
tests.description: Birds should have ~90% swimming ability

tests.name: fish_youtube
tests.description: Fish should watch YouTube ~90% of the time

tests.description: Turtle should watch YouTube ~90% of the time

tests.name: fish_color
tests.description: Fishs should be predominantly blue (80%)

tests.name: cat_color
tests.description: Cats should be predominantly red (80%)

tests.description: Turtles should be predominantly mixed (80%)

tests.name: dog_young_old_running
tests.description: Young & old dogs (age < 3 or > 8) should run

tests.name: dog_middle_running
tests.description: Middle-aged dogs (3 ≤ age ≤ 8) should not run

tests.name: bird_young_old_running
tests.description: Young & old birds (age < 3 or > 8) should run

tests.name: bird_middle_running
tests.description: Middle-aged birds (3 ≤ age ≤ 8) should not run
